body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Patterson Loving in Warren County on June 15, 1852. Father of Carrie Loving, Willie Loving, and Elizabeth Loving. Merchant in Henry County, Tennessee, in 1850. Merchant in Warren County in 1860. Employed Charles Patterson as a clerk in Warren County in 1860. Merchant in Warren County in 1863.
